commit.message:
re PR target/35225 (gcc segfaults when building GTK+ code with -O2 -fPIC for SH4)

	PR target/35225
	* config/sh/sh.c (find_barrier): Don't go past 'from' argument.

From-SVN: r132503

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2008-02-20  Kaz Kojima  <kkojima@gcc.gnu.org>
+
+	PR target/35225
+	* config/sh/sh.c (find_barrier): Don't go past 'from' argument.
+
 2008-02-20  Kaz Kojima  <kkojima@gcc.gnu.org>
 
 	PR target/35190
